p: Alcoholic extracts at 0.1 and 0.25 mg/mL showed the highest TFC, while aqueous ones had the lowest TPC overall, but with no observed significant differences. Specifically, methanolic and ethanolic extracts of Ov had the highest TFC (22.49 and 19.36 mg QE/g). Once again, the lowest amount of TFC was detected in aqueous extracts of Tm (7.27 mg QE/g).
